content:
I've added this stream for discussion of testing and validation of FHIR implementations and the Crucible project.

Source code: https://github.com/fhir-crucible/crucible

Public instance: https://projectcrucible.org

In preparation for the Connectathon starting tomorrow in Baltimore, we've added two new tools to Crucible.

First, a tool that adds test data to your STU3 server... it requires transaction support on the server-side.

Second, a tool that scores a patient record... you can submit an $everything url, upload a file, or copy and paste a Bundle.
@Grahame Grieve Some... we tend to test mostly with your server, HAPI, and healthconnex during our development... is there something in particular you were wondering about?
Well, I think it is at 87% of tests passing as of a few days ago... that may go up since we just fixed a few broken tests (errors on our end).
